com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.server.interfaces
Interface DynamicEntity

All Superinterfaces:
com.sun.sgs.app.ManagedObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
SnowmanFlag, SnowmanPlayer
All Known Implementing Classes:
RobotImpl, SnowmanFlagImpl, SnowmanPlayerImpl
public interface DynamicEntity
extends com.sun.sgs.app.ManagedObject

A DynamicEntity represents a movable entity in the snowman world. This could be a player, a flag, a campfire, etc.

Author:
Owen Kellett

Method Summary
 int getID()
          This method gets the id.
 float getX()
          Get the X coordinate of the entity in the world at the given time.

          Get the Y coordinate of the entity in the world at the given time.
 void setID(int i)
          This method sets the id.
 void setLocation(float x, float y)
          Set the location of the entity in the world.
